mn133:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati tapodārāme.
mn133:1.3: Atha kho āyasmā samiddhi rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya yena tapodo tenupasaṅkami gattāni parisiñcituṁ.
mn133:1.4: Tapode gattāni parisiñcitvā paccuttaritvā ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsi gattāni pubbāpayamāno.
mn133:1.5: Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ tapodaṁ obhāsetvā yenāyasmā samiddhi tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho sā devatā āyasmantaṁ samiddhiṁ etadavoca:
mn133:2.2: “Na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:2.3: Tvaṁ panāvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañcā”ti?
mn133:2.4: “Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:2.5: Dhāresi pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gāthā”ti?
mn133:2.6: “Na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthāti.
mn133:2.8: “Ahampi kho, bhikkhu na dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthāti.
mn133:2.9: Uggaṇhāhi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn133:2.10: pariyāpuṇāhi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn133:2.11: dhārehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:2.12: Atthasaṁhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhaṅgo ca ādibrahmacariyako”ti.
mn133:3.1: Atha kho āyasmā samiddhi tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā samiddhi bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn133:3.2: “Idhāhaṁ, bhante, rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya yena tapodo tenupasaṅkamiṁ gattāni parisiñcituṁ.
mn133:3.3: Tapode gattāni parisiñcitvā paccuttaritvā ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsiṁ gattāni pubbāpayamāno.
mn133:3.4: Atha kho bhante, aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ tapodaṁ obhāsetvā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho sā devatā maṁ etadavoca:
mn133:4.1: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhante, taṁ devataṁ etadavocaṁ:
mn133:4.2: ‘na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:4.3: Tvaṁ panāvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañcā’ti?
mn133:4.4: ‘Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:4.5: Dhāresi pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gāthā’ti?
mn133:4.6: ‘Na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthāti.
mn133:4.8: ‘Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthāti.
mn133:4.9: Uggaṇhāhi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn133:4.10: pariyāpuṇāhi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn133:4.11: dhārehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:4.12: Atthasaṁhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhaṅgo ca ādibrahmacariyako’ti.
mn133:4.15: Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca desetū”ti.
mn133:4.16: “Tena hi, bhikkhu, suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn133:4.17: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā samiddhi bhagavato paccassosi.
mn133:6.2: idaṁ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ pāvisi.
mn133:7.1: Atha kho tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, acirapakkantassa bhagavato, etadahosi:
mn133:7.2: “idaṁ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
mn133:7.19: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajeyyā”ti?
mn133:7.21: “ayaṁ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ;
mn133:7.22: pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajituṁ.
mn133:7.23: Yannūna mayaṁ yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkameyyāma; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyāmā”ti.
mn133:7.24: Atha kho te bhikkhū yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā mahākaccānena saddhiṁ sammodiṁsu.
mn133:7.25: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ etadavocuṁ:
mn133:7.26: “idaṁ kho no, āvuso kaccāna, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
mn133:7.31: Tesaṁ no, āvuso kaccāna, amhākaṁ, acirapakkantassa bhagavato, etadahosi—
mn133:7.32: idaṁ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
mn133:8.1: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajeyyāti?
mn133:8.2: Tesaṁ no, āvuso kaccāna, amhākaṁ etadahosi:
mn133:8.3: ‘ayaṁ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ.
mn133:8.4: Pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajituṁ.
mn133:8.5: Yannūna mayaṁ yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkameyyāma; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyāmā’ti.
mn133:9.1: “Seyyathāpi, āvuso, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva mūlaṁ atikkamma khandhaṁ sākhāpalāse sāraṁ pariyesitabbaṁ maññeyya;
mn133:9.2: evaṁsampadamidaṁ āyasmantānaṁ satthari sammukhībhūte taṁ bhagavantaṁ atisitvā amhe etamatthaṁ paṭipucchitabbaṁ maññatha.
mn133:9.3: So hāvuso, bhagavā jānaṁ jānāti, passaṁ passati, cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhammassāmī tathāgato.
mn133:9.4: So ceva panetassa kālo ahosi yaṁ bhagavantaṁyeva etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyātha, yathā vo bhagavā byākareyya tathā naṁ dhāreyyāthā”ti.
mn133:10.1: “Addhāvuso kaccāna, bhagavā jānaṁ jānāti, passaṁ passati, cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhammassāmī tathāgato.
mn133:10.2: So ceva panetassa kālo ahosi yaṁ bhagavantaṁyeva etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyāma;
mn133:10.3: yathā no bhagavā byākareyya tathā naṁ dhāreyyāma.
mn133:10.4: Api cāyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ;
mn133:10.5: pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajituṁ.
mn133:11.1: “Tena hāvuso, suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn133:11.2: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahākaccānassa paccassosuṁ.
mn133:12.1: “Yaṁ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
mn133:12.6: Imassa kho ahaṁ, āvuso, bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmi—
mn133:13.2: Iti me cakkhu ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti rūpāti—
mn133:13.3: tattha chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṁ hoti viññāṇaṁ, chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto atītaṁ anvāgameti.
mn133:13.4: Iti me sotaṁ ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti saddāti …pe…
mn133:13.5: iti me ghānaṁ ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti gandhāti …
mn133:13.6: iti me jivhā ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti rasāti …
mn133:13.7: iti me kāyo ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti phoṭṭhabbāti …
mn133:13.8: iti me mano ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti dhammāti—
mn133:13.9: tattha chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṁ hoti viññāṇaṁ, chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto atītaṁ anvāgameti—
mn133:14.2: Iti me cakkhu ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti rūpāti—
mn133:14.3: tattha na chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṁ hoti viññāṇaṁ, na chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto atītaṁ nānvāgameti.
mn133:14.4: Iti me sotaṁ ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti saddāti …pe…
mn133:14.5: iti me ghānaṁ ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti gandhāti …
mn133:14.6: iti me jivhā ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti rasāti …
mn133:14.7: iti me kāyo ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti phoṭṭhabbāti …
mn133:14.8: iti me mano ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti dhammāti—
mn133:14.9: tattha na chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṁ hoti viññāṇaṁ, na chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa, na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto atītaṁ nānvāgameti—
mn133:15.2: Iti me cakkhu siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti rūpāti—
mn133:15.3: appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṁ paṇidahati, cetaso paṇidhānapaccayā tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto anāgataṁ paṭikaṅkhati.
mn133:15.4: Iti me sotaṁ siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti saddāti …pe…
mn133:15.5: iti me ghānaṁ siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti gandhāti …
mn133:15.6: iti me jivhā siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti rasāti …
mn133:15.7: iti me kāyo siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti phoṭṭhabbāti …
mn133:15.8: iti me mano siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti dhammāti—
mn133:15.9: appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṁ paṇidahati, cetaso paṇidhānapaccayā tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto anāgataṁ paṭikaṅkhati—
mn133:16.2: Iti me cakkhu siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti rūpāti—
mn133:16.3: appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṁ nappaṇidahati, cetaso appaṇidhānapaccayā na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto anāgataṁ nappaṭikaṅkhati.
mn133:16.4: Iti me sotaṁ siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti saddāti …pe…
mn133:16.5: iti me ghānaṁ siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti gandhāti …
mn133:16.6: iti me jivhā siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti rasāti …
mn133:16.7: iti me kāyo siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti phoṭṭhabbāti …
mn133:16.8: iti me mano siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti dhammāti—
mn133:16.9: appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṁ nappaṇidahati, cetaso appaṇidhānapaccayā na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto anāgataṁ nappaṭikaṅkhati—
mn133:17.4: Tasmiñce paccuppanne chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṁ hoti viññāṇaṁ, chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu saṁhīrati.
mn133:17.7: yā cāvuso, jivhā ye ca rasā …
mn133:17.8: yo cāvuso, kāyo ye ca phoṭṭhabbā …
mn133:17.9: yo cāvuso, mano ye ca dhammā—
mn133:17.11: Tasmiñce paccuppanne chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṁ hoti viññāṇaṁ, chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu saṁhīrati—
mn133:17.12: evaṁ kho, āvuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu saṁhīrati.
mn133:18.1: Kathañca, āvuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṁhīrati?
mn133:18.4: Tasmiñce paccuppanne na chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṁ hoti viññāṇaṁ, na chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṁhīrati.
mn133:18.7: yā cāvuso, jivhā ye ca rasā …
mn133:18.8: yo cāvuso, kāyo ye ca phoṭṭhabbā …
mn133:18.9: yo cāvuso, mano ye ca dhammā—
mn133:18.11: Tasmiñce paccuppanne na chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṁ hoti viññāṇaṁ, na chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṁhīrati—
mn133:18.12: evaṁ kho, āvuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṁhīrati.
mn133:19.1: Yaṁ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
mn133:19.6: Imassa kho ahaṁ, āvuso, bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmi.
mn133:19.7: Ākaṅkhamānā ca pana tumhe āyasmanto bhagavantaṁyeva upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyātha,
mn133:19.8: yathā vo bhagavā byākaroti tathā naṁ dhāreyyāthā”ti.
mn133:20.1: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahākaccānassa bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
mn133:20.2: “yaṁ kho no, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
mn133:20.7: Tesaṁ no, bhante, amhākaṁ, acirapakkantassa bhagavato, etadahosi:
mn133:20.8: ‘idaṁ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
mn133:20.25: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajeyyā’ti?
mn133:20.27: ‘ayaṁ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ.
mn133:20.28: Pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajituṁ.
mn133:20.29: Yannūna mayaṁ yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkameyyāma; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyāmā’ti.
mn133:20.30: Atha kho mayaṁ, bhante, yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkamimha; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ etamatthaṁ paṭipucchimha.
mn133:20.31: Tesaṁ no, bhante, āyasmatā mahākaccānena imehi ākārehi imehi padehi imehi byañjanehi attho vibhatto”ti.
mn133:21.2: Mañcepi tumhe, bhikkhave, etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyātha, ahampi taṁ evamevaṁ byākareyyaṁ yathā taṁ mahākaccānena byākataṁ.
mn133:21.3: Eso cevetassa attho. Evañca naṁ dhārethā”ti.
mn133:21.5: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
